body_html:
I did try the installation via Anaconda too. Same problem. The code I used:

conda create -n Py34pytorch python=3.6
activate Py34pytorch

conda install numpy pyyaml mkl mkl-include setuptools cmake cffi typing pandas seaborn plotly scipy statsmodels jupyter notebook -y
pip install cufflinks -y
pip install sklearn -y
conda install -c conda-forge tbb -y

cd C:\Users\Gabi\Downloads
git clone --recursive https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch
cd pytorch

set "VS150COMNTOOLS=C:\Program Files (x86)\Microsoft Visual Studio\2017\Enterprise\VC\Auxiliary\Build"
set CMAKE_GENERATOR=Visual Studio 15 2017 Win64
set DISTUTILS_USE_SDK=1
call "%VS150COMNTOOLS%\vcvarsall.bat" x64 -vcvars_ver=14.11
python setup.py install

I get the same error message as above...

body:
I did try the installation via Anaconda too. Same problem. The code I used:

```
conda create -n Py34pytorch python=3.6
activate Py34pytorch

conda install numpy pyyaml mkl mkl-include setuptools cmake cffi typing pandas seaborn plotly scipy statsmodels jupyter notebook -y
pip install cufflinks -y
pip install sklearn -y
conda install -c conda-forge tbb -y

cd C:\Users\Gabi\Downloads
git clone --recursive https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch
cd pytorch

set "VS150COMNTOOLS=C:\Program Files (x86)\Microsoft Visual Studio\2017\Enterprise\VC\Auxiliary\Build"
set CMAKE_GENERATOR=Visual Studio 15 2017 Win64
set DISTUTILS_USE_SDK=1
call "%VS150COMNTOOLS%\vcvarsall.bat" x64 -vcvars_ver=14.11
python setup.py install
```

I get the same error message as above...
